WorkItem.Description:
Was trying to find the difference between my character and Rawr, and it came down to missing socket bonuses on a few items.
 
The socket bonus was missing for:
Chestguard of Radiant Glory (397)
Blackhorn's Mighty Bulwark (397)
Legguards of Radiant Glory (384)
Graveheart Bracers (397)
Faceguard of Radiant Glory (384)
 
This is probably an issure for many more items.

Comments.Message: I actually noticed this last night when playing with my Prot Pally alt. I'll get this fixed later today. Just want to make sure there isn't an issue with the item import info in the Wowhead module since there could be an issue there.

Also, Rawr says Parry = Dodge when at 100% ctc (level 85), but I'm pretty sure that's not the case?  even above 100%, doesn't more dodge/parry push blocks off the table?  So at 100% dodge should still be preferred over parry.  I noticed this because my character is at 100.005% ctc and one of the reforges is from dodge -> parry, but if I take away the reforge, the "Damage taken per second" value does not change (it should because going into dodge pushes more blocks off the combat table)
level 88 I mean, don't see an edit button

Many socket bonuses are still missing: Handguards of Radiant Glory (397), Goriona's Collar (397), Legguards of Radiant Glory (397), Chestplate of the Unshakable Titan, Faceguard of Radiant Glory (397)
